Verses: 1 appollo Enbavan Korindhu Pattanaththile Irukkaiyil, Pavul Medaana Thesangal Vazhiyaaip Poi Ebesuvukku Vandhaan; Ange Sila Seesharaik Kandu:
2 neengal Visuvaasigalaanabodhu, Parisuththa Aaviyaip Petreergalaa Endru Kettaan. Adharku Avargal: Parisuththa Aavi Undenbadhai Naangal Kelvippadave Illai Endraargal.
3 appozhudhu Avan: Appadiyaanaal Neengal Endha Gnaanasnaanam Petreergal Endraan. Adharku Avargal: Yovaan Koduththa Gnaanasnaanam Petrom Endraargal.
4 appozhudhu Pavul: Yovaan Thanakkuppin Varugiravaraagiya Kiristhu Yesuvil Visuvaasigalaayirukkavendum Endru Janangalukkuch Solli, Mananthirumbudhalukku Etra Gnaanasnaanaththaik Koduththaane Endraan.
5 adhaik Kettapodhu Avargal: Karththaraagiya Yesuvin Naamaththinaale Gnaanasnaanam Petraargal.
6 allaamalum Pavul Avargalmel Kaigalai Vaiththabodhu, Parisuththaavi Avargalmel Vandhaar; Appozhudhu Avargal Anniyabaashaigalaip Pesith Theerkkadharisananj Sonnaargal.
7 andha Manusharellaarum Erakkuraiyap Panniranduperaayirundhaargal.
8 pinbu Pavul Jebaaalayaththil Piravesiththu, Dhairiyamaaip Pirasangiththu, Moondru Maadhamalavum Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththukkaduththavaigalaikkuriththuch Sambaashanaipanni, Buththisollikkonduvandhaan.

9 silar Kadinappattu Avisuvaasigalaagik Koottaththirku Munbaaga Indha Maarkkaththai Nindhiththapodhu, Avan Avargalai Vittu Vilagi, Seesharai Avargalilirundhu Piriththukkondu, Thirannu Ennum Oruvanudaiya Viththiyaasaalaiyile Anudhinamum Sambaashiththukkonduvandhaan
10 irandu Varushakaalam Ippadi Nadandhadhinaale Aasiyaavil Kudiyirundha Yoodharum Girekkarumaagiya Ellaarum Karththaraagiya Yesuvin Vasanaththaik Kettaargal.
11 pavulin Kaigalinaale Dhevan Viseshiththa Arpudhangalaich Seydharulinaar.
12 avanudaiya Sareeraththilirundhu Urumaalgalaiyum Kachchaigalaiyum Konduvandhu, Viyaadhikkaararmel Poda Viyaadhigal Avargalaivittu Neengippoyina; Pollaadha Aavigalum Avargalaivittup Purappattana.

13 appozhudhu Dhesaandharigalaaith Thirigira Mandhiravaadhigalaagiya Yoodharil Silar Pollaadha Aavigal Pidiththirundhavargalmel Karththaraagiya Yesuvin Naamaththaich Sollath Thunindhu: Pavul Pirasangikkira Yesuvinperil Aanaiyittu Ungalukkuk Kattalaiyidugirom Endraargal.
14 piradhaana Aasaariyanaagiya Skevaa Ennum Or Yoodhanudaiya Kumaarar Ezhuper Ippadich Seydhaargal.
15 pollaadha Aavi Avargalai Nokki: Yesuvai Ariven, Pavulaiyum Ariven, Neengal Yaar Endru Solli,
16 pollaadha Aaviyaiyudaiya Manushan Avargalmel Paaindhu, Balaadhkaarampanni, Avargalai Merkolla, Avargal Niruvaanigalum Kaayappattavargalumaagi Andha Veettai Vittu Odipponaargal.
17 idhu Ebesuvile Kudiyirundha Yoodhar Girekkar Anaivarukkum Theriyavandhabodhu, Avargalellaarum Bayamadaindhaargal; Karththaraagiya Yesuvin Naamam Magimaippattadhu.
18 visuvaasiththavargalil Anegar Vandhu, Thangal Seygaigalai Velippaduththi Arikkaiyittaargal.

19 maayaviththaikkaararaayirundhavargalil Anegar Thangal Pusthagangalaik Konduvandhu, Ellaarukku Munbaagach Sutteriththaargal; Avaigalin Kirayaththaith Thogaipaarththu, Aimbadhinaayiram Vellikkaasaagak Kandaargal.
20 ivvalavu Balamaaik Karththarudaiya Vasanam Viruththiyadaindhu Merkondadhu.

21 ivaigal Mudindhapinbu, Pavul Makkedhoniyaa Agaayaa Ennum Naadugalil Sutrinadandhu, Erusalemukkuppogumpadi Aaviyil Nirunayampannikkondu: Naan Ange Ponapinbu Romaaburiyaiyum Paarkkavendiyadhendru Solli,
22 thanakku Udhaviseydhavargalil Iranduperaagiya Theemoththeyuvaiyum Erasdhuvaiyum Makkedhoniyaavukku Anuppivittu; Thaan Pinnunj Silakaalam Aasiyaavile Thanginaan.
23 akkaalaththile Indha Maarkkaththaikkuriththup Periya Kalagam Undaayitru.
24 eppadiyendraal, Themeththiriyu Ennum Perkonda Oru Thattaan Dhiyaanaalin Kovilaippola Velliyinaal Siriya Kovilgalaich Seydhu, Thozhilaaligalukku Migundha Aadhaayam Varuviththukkondirundhaan.
25 ivargalaiyum Ippadippatta Thozhilseygira Matra Velaiyaatkalaiyum Avan Koodivarachseydhu: Manushargale, Indhath Thozhilinaal Namakku Nalla Pizhaippu Undaayirukkiradhendru Ariveergal.

26 ippadiyirukka, Kaigalinaal Seyyappatta Dhevargal Dhevargalallavendru Indhap Pavul Enbavan Solli, Ebesuvilemaaththiramalla, Konjanguraiya Aasiyaa Engum Anega Janangalukkup Podhiththu, Avargalai Vasappaduththikkondaan Endru Neengal Kandum Kettum Irukkireergal.

27 idhanaal Nammudaiya Thozhil Atruppogumpadiyaana Abaayam Nerittirukkiradhumallaamal, Magaa Dheviyaagiya Dhiyaanaaludaiya Kovil Ennamatruppogiradharkum, Aasiyaa Muzhumaiyum Poochchakkaramum Sevikkira Avaludaiya Magaththuvam Azhindhupogiradharkum Edhuvaayirukkiradhu Endraan.
28 avargal Idhaik Kettu, Kobaththaal Niraindhu: Ebesiyarudaiya Dhiyaanaale Periyaval Endru Saththamittaargal.

29 pattanam Muzhuvadhum Kalagaththinaal Niraindhadhu. Pavulukku Vazhiththunaiyaai Vandha Makkedhoniyaraagiya Kaayuvaiyum Arisdharkkuvaiyum Avargal Izhuththukkondu, Orumanappattu Arangasaalaikkup Paaindhodinaargal.
30 pavul Koottaththukkulle Pogamanadhaayirundhabodhu, Seeshargal Avanaippogavidavillai.
31 aasiyaanaattuth Thalaivaril Avanukkuch Sinegidharaayirundha Silarum Avanidaththirku Aal Anuppi, Arangasaalaikkul Pogavendaam Endru Echchariththaargal.
32 koottaththil Amaliyundaagi, Silar Ippadiyum Silar Appadiyumaagap Pesinaargal; Thaangal Koodivandha Kaariyam Innadhendru Anegarukkuth Theriyaadhirundhadhu.

33 appozhudhu Yoodhargal Aleksandhar Enbavanai Munnirkath Thallugaiyil, Koottaththile Silar Avanai Munne Izhuththuvittaargal. Aleksandhar Kaiyamarththi, Janangalukku Uththaravusolla Manadhaayirundhaan.
34 avan Yoodhanendru Avargal Arindhabodhu, Ebesiyarudaiya Dhiyaanaale Periyaval Endru Irandumani Neramalavum Ellaarum Egamaaich Saththamittuk Kondirundhaargal.

35 pattanaththuch Sambiradhiyaanavan Janangalai Amarththi: Ebesiyare, Ebesiyarudaiya Pattanam Magaa Dheviyaagiya Dhiyaanaalukkum Vaanaththilirundhu Vizhundha Silaikkum Kovirparisaaragiyaayirukkiradhai Ariyaadhavan Undo?
36 idhu Edhirpesappadaadha Kaariyamaagaiyaal, Neengal Ondrum Padharichseyyaamal Amarndhirukkavendum.
37 indha Manusharai Inge Konduvandheergal; Ivargal Kovirkollaikkaararumalla, Ungal Dheviyaith Dhooshikkiravargalumalla.

38 themaththiriyukkum Avanaich Serndha Thozhilaaligalukkum Oruvanmel Orukaariyam Undaayirundhaal, Niyaayam Visaarikkira Naatkalundu, Dhesaadhipadhigalum Irukkiraargal; Oruvarperiloruvar Vazhakkaadikkollattum.
39 neengal Vere Yaadhoru Kaariyaththaikkuriththu Visaarikkavendiyadhaanaal, Adhu Niyaayasangaththile Theerkkappadum.

40 indraikku Undaana Kalagaththaikkuriththu Naam Uththaravusollugiradharku Edhuvillaadhapadiyaal, Indhak Kalagaththaikkuriththu Naangal Visaarikkappadumbodhu, Kutravaaligalaagiradharku Edhuvaayiruppom Endru Solli,
41 pinbu Koottaththai Anuppivittaan.
